newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 22.255 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 22.255 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day interbank TIIE interest rate fell by 21 basis points to 22.2550 percent on Wednesday, from 22.4650 percent on Tuesday, Banco de Mexico said.
The 91-day TIIE fell 33.50 basis points to 22.2500 percent on Wednesday from 22.5850 percent the week before.
The 28-day TIIP meanwhile fell 31.32 basis points to 22.30 percent on Wednesday from 22.6132 percent the week before.
The TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate that is replacing the TIIP, an average interbank rate.
